item.title: Getting started with Social Engineering Toolkit
item.description: What is Social Engineering? linkTechnology is making it easier for cybercriminals to exploit human behavior, cognitive biases, and social dynamics. The most common attack method used by hackers is social engineering. In other words, itâ€™s influencing someone to do something or say something. Many types of social engineering attacks are out there, including phishing, pretexting, baiting, and tailgating. What is the Social Engineering Toolkit(SET)? linkSocial Engineering Toolkit (SET) is a versatile tool that enables you to simulate a wide range of social engineering attacks.
